codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGenderVS
codeSystems.title: Administrative Gender
codeSystems.description: A value set containing administrative gender codes from the FHIR core.

codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: AllLanguages
codeSystems.title: All Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: PracticeSettingCodeValueSet
codeSystems.title: Practice Setting Code Value Set
codeSystems.description: This is the code representing the clinical specialty of the clinician or provider who    interacted with, treated, or provided a service to/for the patient. The value set used    for clinical specialty has been limited by HITSP to the value set reproduced from HITSP    C80 Table 2-149 Clinical Specialty Value Set Definition.

codeSystems.name: ConditionProblemDiagnosisCodes
codeSystems.title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
codeSystems.description: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

codeSystems.name: AdmitSource
codeSystems.title: Admit Source
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate from where the patient came in.

codeSystems.name: EncounterDiagnosisUse
codeSystems.title: Encounter Diagnosis Use
codeSystems.description: What a specific Encounter/EpisodeOfCare `diagnosis.condition` is to be used for.

codeSystems.name: EncounterDiet
codeSystems.title: Diet
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate dietary preferences or restrictions a patient may have.

codeSystems.name: DischargeDisposition
codeSystems.title: Discharge Disposition
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to where the patient left the hospital.

codeSystems.name: EncounterLocationStatus
codeSystems.title: Encounter Location Status
codeSystems.description: The status of the location.

codeSystems.name: ParticipantType
codeSystems.title: Participant Type
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate how an individual participates in an encounter.

codeSystems.name: EncounterReasonCodes
codeSystems.title: Encounter Reason Codes
codeSystems.description: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

codeSystems.name: EncounterReasonUse
codeSystems.title: Encounter Reason Use
codeSystems.description: What a specific Encounter/EpisodeOfCare `reason.value` is to be used for.

codeSystems.name: SpecialArrangements
codeSystems.title: Special Arrangements
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the kinds of special arrangements in place for a patients visit.

codeSystems.name: SpecialCourtesy
codeSystems.title: Special Courtesy
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate special courtesies provided to the patient.

codeSystems.name: EncounterStatus
codeSystems.title: Encounter Status
codeSystems.description: Current state of the encounter.

codeSystems.name: EncounterSubjectStatus
codeSystems.title: Encounter Subject Status
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the status of the subject within the encounter

codeSystems.name: EncounterType
codeSystems.title: Encounter Type
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierTypeCodes
codeSystems.title: Identifier Type Codes
codeSystems.description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.title: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.description: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: LinkType
codeSystems.title: Link Type
codeSystems.description: The type of link between this Patient resource and another Patient/RelatedPerson resource.

codeSystems.name: LocationCharacteristic
codeSystems.title: Location Characteristic
codeSystems.description: Example Set of Location Characteristics

codeSystems.name: LocationForm
codeSystems.title: Location Form
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

codeSystems.name: LocationMode
codeSystems.title: Location Mode
codeSystems.description: Indicates whether a resource instance represents a specific location or a class of locations.

codeSystems.name: LocationStatus
codeSystems.title: Location Status
codeSystems.description: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

codeSystems.name: MaritalStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Marital Status Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: NameUse
codeSystems.title: NameUse
codeSystems.description: The use of a human name.

codeSystems.name: PatientContactRelationship
codeSystems.title: Patient Contact Relationship
codeSystems.description: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

codeSystems.name: PractitionerRole
codeSystems.title: Practitioner Role
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.

codeSystems.name: ServiceMode
codeSystems.title: Service Mode
codeSystems.description: An example set of Service Modes that could be applicable to use to characterize HealthcareServices or PractitionerRoles while searching

codeSystems.name: ServiceType
codeSystems.title: Service Type
codeSystems.description: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

codeSystems.name: EncounterClass
codeSystems.title: Encounter class
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the class of encounter: a specific code indicating class of service provided.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSReAdmissionIndicator
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-re-admissionIndicator
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSBedStatus
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-bedStatus
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify the state of a bed in an inpatient setting, and is used to determine if a patient may be assigned to it or not.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSDegreeLicenseCertificate
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-degreeLicenseCertificate
codeSystems.description: Concepts specifying an educational degree (e.g., MD).  Used in the CNN datatype (names and identifiers of clinicians) in Version 2 messaging.  Used in Version 2 messaging; note that in releases of HL7 prior to 2.3.1, was also used in person names (XPN), but this use was deprecated, then withdrawn in 2.7.

codeSystems.name: ActPriority
codeSystems.title: ActPriority
codeSystems.description:
A code or set of codes (e.g., for routine, emergency,) specifying the urgency under which the Act happened, can happen, is happening, is intended to happen, or is requested/demanded to happen.

*Discussion:* This attribute is used in orders to indicate the ordered priority, and in event documentation it indicates the actual priority used to perform the act. In definition mood it indicates the available priorities.

codeSystems.name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
codeSystems.title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
codeSystems.description: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.

codeSystems.name: AgeRangeVS
codeSystems.title: Age Range
codeSystems.description: ValueSet including selected HMIS age ranges from the PeriodRangeCS CodeSystem

codeSystems.name: ConditionSeverityVS
codeSystems.title: Condition / Diagnosis Severity
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading

codeSystems.name: DistrictVS
codeSystems.title: District
codeSystems.description: All district used in administrative divisions

codeSystems.name: EducationalLevelVS
codeSystems.title: Educational Level
codeSystems.description: Combined SNOMED CT, HL7 v3, and local codes for the highest level of education attained.

codeSystems.name: EmploymentStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Employment (रोजगारी स्थिति)
codeSystems.description: Codes representing employment status of a person.

codeSystems.name: EthnicCodeVS
codeSystems.title: Ethnic Code
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for जाति कोड (Ethnic Codes in Nepal)

codeSystems.name: FreeCostVS
codeSystems.title: Free Cost
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for Free Cost

codeSystems.name: FreeServiceEligibilityVS
codeSystems.title: Free Service Eligibility
codeSystems.description: ValueSet representing individuals eligible for free health services

codeSystems.name: LocalBodyVS
codeSystems.title: LocalBody
codeSystems.description: All LocalBody used in administrative divisions

codeSystems.name: MaritalStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Marital Status (वैवाहिक स्थिति)
codeSystems.description: Codes representing marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: OptionSetYesNoVS
codeSystems.title: Option Set - Yes / No / Yes-only / Don't know / Not applicable / Positive / Negative
codeSystems.description:
Master option set for Yes/No/Yes-only/Don't know/Not applicable, Positive/Negative questions, including Nepali designations:छ/छैन, 
हो/होइन, गराएको/नगराएको, लिएको/नलिएको, भएको/नभएको, पास/फेल, पाएको/नपाएको
Used for:
- Presumptive TB Case (सम्भावित क्षयरोग विरामी)
- Gender Based Violence (लैंगिक हिंसा)
- Exclusively Breastfeeding (शिशुलाइ जन्मेको ६ महिना सम्म स्तनपान मात्र गराएको)
- Complementary Food (६ महिना पछि स्तनपान साथै ठोस, अर्धठोस र नरम खाना सुरू)
- GDS Present (General Danger Sign Present)
- Chest Indrawing (Yes only)
- Stridor (Yes only)
- Wheezing (Yes only)
- Condom Use
- Lab test results (Positive/Negative)

codeSystems.name: PatientRegistrationTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Patient Registration Type
codeSystems.description: Patient registration types mapped to SNOMED CT concepts with Nepali display.

codeSystems.name: ProvinceVS
codeSystems.title: Province
codeSystems.description: All provinces used in administrative divisions

codeSystems.name: ServiceAreaAddressVS
codeSystems.title: Service Area Address Classification
codeSystems.description: Classification of address locations relative to the organization's service area and referral context, using SNOMED CT concepts to specify whether the address is inside or outside the service area and the type of location involved.

codeSystems.name: ServiceTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Service Type
codeSystems.description: Service Type

codeSystems.name: VisitOrdinalVS
codeSystems.title: Patient Visit Ordinal
codeSystems.description: ValueSet combining SNOMED CT codes for first and follow-up visits with local codes for second, third, and repeat visits.
